trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around June 11th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMyself and my wife were in LasVagus NEV.for our daughters weading,we were leaving our hotel New York to see the sites and as we crossed over a pedestrian bridge i stopped in the center of the bridge to take a picture of the main street with my cellphone, i swear when i went to take the picture i saw nothing in the sky,i took the picture and we then moved on,later that night i reviewed my photos,thats when i realized i had something more than just a photo of downtown LasVagus,this photo is still in my cellphone it appears to be a very large object a v shape, it had one light on the bottom front on light farther back on its left wing (my left) on its right wing two lights (my right) i believe what it is it must have been going past at a speed that no one could observe it with the human eye,i believe my cellphone froze it in motion, i just dont know,maby somebody can explain it I sure cant,im a retired Philly cop and i have seen a lot of weird things but this takes the cake, i cant say that i saw it with my own eyes but its there in my phone camera.
Summary: After my daughter got married my wife and i left hotel New YORK while crossing on ped bridge took picture with cellphone of city
